title: Happy Birthday, Maki-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ah, there you are. Happy birthday, Maki-chan! Come, your birthday party is about to start. I’ll take you to the location.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Geez, I wonder how long you guys will keep doing this childish tradition.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You say that, but you waited at such an obvious place to find, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s-.... it’s not like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, you’re really not honest, aren’t you, Maki-chan? Just like Nico-chan said. Alright, let’s get you ready.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Today, I’ll make you as beautiful as I can♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eeeh!? No, it’s fine. You really don’t have to.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Don’t be shy. I’ve been thinking a lot about what colors suit you, Maki-chan. Look, I brought a bunch of lipsticks and blushes. Is there a color you like?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....This one.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Alright, close your eyes. The next time you open your eyes, the magic will already happen♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>D-, don’t overdo it, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Okay, you can open your eyes now. What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....It’s amazing. Umm, thanks, Karin. I really like it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
